title: Goldi Solar to increase module manufacturing capacity by FY26
description: Goldi Solar is set to expand its module manufacturing capacity to 14 GW by mid FY26 and its cell manufacturing capacity to 4 GW by FY27. The company will increase its workforce by over 4,000 employees. This expansion aims to strengthen India's solar infrastructure, improve production efficiency, and reduce reliance on imports, aligning with global green energy goals.
